title: Folding Server ISO Clipboard - Black
features: Sturdy spring clip to hold all your patient cards/documents
description: Our thinnest folding black powder coated pocket clipboard made fromlightweightsturdy aluminum construction for all your notes and small documents. This is the long version of our clipboard and can be used for lists, notes and small documents. Ideal for anyone needing a small writing surface that folds to protect its contents for easy carrying. Notepad included and you can add additional pads as an option. The Mini Vertical Clipboard is great for any list/s, construction workers, waitress, waiters, grocery lists, field workers and the medical community.
